splashPage.slide1: Anyone can ship with mobile phone
splashPage.slide2: Get rate and service at a glance
splashPage.slide3: Easy to fill up shipment details
splashPage.slide4: Present shipment barcode at FedEx location to complete shipment

message1.title: New Feature
message1.header: New Mobile Shipping Tool for shippers without an account
message1.description: Ship with FedEx Ship Manager ® Lite using your mobile device and drop off your package at a FedEx Station or World Service Center. No need for a FedEx account or to print a shipping label.

message2.title: News
message2.description: We are monitoring the impact of the COVID-19 outbreak.  Stay connected with more news here

message3.title: Special Offer
message3.description: From now till 31 Dec, you can enjoy 30% discount* using New FedEx Ship Manager. Sign up now for the FedEx “Ship More, Save More” Program using your credit card and enjoy great discounts on your international shipments!

message4.title: Service Update
message4.description: Easily locate 2,500+ shipping locations across APAC on fedex.com

loginPage.termsOfUseNote: By using FedEx Ship Manager® Lite, you hereby accept the Terms of Use , Privacy Statement and Global Privacy Policy. In addition, you hereby represent and warrant that you are the user and/or subscriber of the contact details provided by you through FedEx Ship Manager® Lite.

recipientAddressBook.noContactsYet: You don't have any contacts yet

rateAndDeliveryOptionsPage.finalRateNote: Your final rate is determined by the actual weight and dimensions of your shipment as measured by FedEx.
rateAndDeliveryOptionsPage.dimensionalWeightHint: The transport costs for your shipments are calculated on the basis of the total weight of all packages sent under one FedEx Air Waybill. A decisive factor for calculating the price, however, is whether the dimensional weight (L x W x H / 5000) exceeds the actual weight*.
rateAndDeliveryOptionsPage.dimensionalWeightExceedLimitMessage: Your Shipment dimension reaches to the limit the FSM LITE can support, please use other FedEx shipping application to complete the shipment.
rateAndDeliveryOptionsPage.rateApiErrorMessage: Services and rates are not available. International Priority is the default service for this shipment. Please check with our courier for any change.

customsDetailsPage.higherLimitNote: Purchase a higher limit of liability coverage from FedEx?
customsDetailsPage.declaredValueNote: Declared value for carriage should not be more than the total customs
customsDetailsPage.declareValueTooltip: If you choose to declare a value for carriage and pay the applicable surcharge, our maximum liability for this shipment in the case of, for example, loss, damage or delay, will equal the amount that you declared, subject to our Conditions of Carriage. If you choose not to declare a value here, our maximum liability for this shipment remains as set out in our Conditions of Carriage.

validationError.invalidCustomsValue: The customs value can’t be less than your declared value for carriage of {{CARRIAGE_VALUE}}
validationError.invalidCarriageValueLimit: The maximum declared value is USD{{CARRIAGE_VALUE_USD}}. Contact FedEx Customer Service for more information.
validationError.minLengthItemDescription: Item description must be at least 6 characters.
validationError.requiredCustomsValue: Please make sure the total customs value is at least 1
validationError.requiredMinimumValue: This value must be greater than or equal to 0.01

customsDetailsPage.purchaseHigherLimitCoverageBubbleHint: If you choose to declare a value for carriage and pay the applicable surcharge, our maximum liability for this shipment in the case of, for example, loss, damage or delay, will equal the amount that you declared, subject to our Conditions of Carriage. If you choose not to declare a value here, our maximum liability for this shipment remains as set out in our Conditions of Carriage.

shipmentPurposeBubbleHint.labelText: Shipment purpose: Select the shipment purpose from the drop-down menu. This information prints on the Commercial Invoice. If no purpose is selected, the field defaults to Commercial and your shipment is cleared through customs under the appropriate country/ location provisions relating to commercial shipments.
shipmentPurposeBubbleHint.commercial: Commercial – Any shipment being sold or sent free of charge, from one business entity to another, for the purpose of being re-sold or otherwise consumed in the course of carrying out its business.
shipmentPurposeBubbleHint.gift: Gift – Any shipment containing articles to be given as an unsolicited gift, from one private individual to another private individual, which are not being shipped by a business nor consigned to a business.
shipmentPurposeBubbleHint.sample: Sample – Any shipment containing articles which are sent free of charge that have been marked or mutilated or otherwise unsuitable for sale or use except as commercial samples, sent with the view of soliciting an order or as a mock-up to furthering an existing order from the foreign entity.
shipmentPurposeBubbleHint.returnAndRepair: Return and Repair – Articles being shipped for repair or articles previously exported for repairs which are being returned following the repair.
shipmentPurposeBubbleHint.personalEffects: Personal Effects – Any shipment containing used personal articles such as unaccompanied baggage and household goods being shipped for relocation.
shipmentPurposeBubbleHint.personalUser: Personal User – Any shipments containing new goods for personal consumption purchased abroad and being shipped back to a private individual.

customsDetailsPage.documentTypeBubbleHInt: Select a description from the drop-down menu that best describes your document, or click Other. If you select Other, you will need to enter additional product details below. Some document types will require that you enter a customs value. The customs value is the sale price for the contents of the shipment if it is being sold. If the shipment is not being sold, the customs value should be the fair market value. The fair market value is the price that a seller would get from a buyer for the contents of the shipment if it were to be sold on the open market.
customsDetailsPage.hsCodeBubbleHint: Entering a proper harmonized code will allow FedEx to help you determine appropriate customs documentation as well as a more accurate duty and tax estimate. The Harmonized Commodity Description and Coding System is an international standardized system developed and maintained by the World Customs Organization (WCO) to uniformly classify traded products.
customsDetailsPage.currencyChangedMessage: Changing the currency from {{prev}} to {{curr}} for your customs value will also change other previous entry.</br> A conversion calculation will not be applied.
customsDetailsPage.currencyUpdationMessage: Your shipment currency has been updated from {{ICurrency}} to {{UCurrency}}

confirmationAlert.subHeader: Are you sure you want to update your currency?

billingAndServicesOptionPage.finalRateNote: The final rate is subjected to the account holder shipment rate
billingAndServicesOptionPage.rateApiErrorNote: Currently the rate is not available, please check with the FedEx agent at the counter or when courier comes for pickup.

signatureOptionBubbleHint.ionText: To request a signature when the package is delivered, select one of the following signature types.
signatureOptionBubbleHint.noneSpecifiedDefination: Standard FedEx delivery procedures will be followed if a signature option is not selected.
signatureOptionBubbleHint.noSignatureRequiredDefination: FedEx may release the package without anyone present. This option may not be available for all shipments or destinations.
signatureOptionBubbleHint.indirectSignatureRequiredDefination: This option may not be available for all shipments or to all destinations. FedEx obtains a signature in one of three ways:
signatureOptionBubbleHint.indirectSignatureRequiredDefinationLevel: - From someone at the delivery address
- From a neighbor, building manager or other person at a neighboring address
- The recipient can authorize release of the package without anyone present
signatureOptionBubbleHint.directSignatureRequiredDefination: Someone at the recipient's address may sign for the delivery. If no one is at the address, FedEx may reattempt delivery. This option may not be available for all shipments.
signatureOptionBubbleHint.adultSignatureRequiredDefination: For shipments to the U.S., FedEx will obtain a signature from someone at least 21 years old (government-issued photo identification required) at the delivery address. For shipments to other destinations, FedEx will obtain a signature from someone at the delivery address who is at least the age of majority in the destination country.  Government-issued photo identification or other identification customarily accepted by local authorities is required. In all cases, if there is no eligible recipient at the delivery address, FedEx will reattempt delivery.

thankYouPage.barcodeNote: Present QR code below at FedEx Location to complete the shipment

termsAndCondition.title: Terms & Conditions
termsAndCondition.bodyPart1: Federal Express Korea LLC (hereinafter referred to as “FedEx” or “Company”) requires your consent on  collection and use of personal information (required), transfer of general personal information to a third party (required), consent to overseas transfer of personal information (required) and consent to use of personal information for marketing purposes (optional) in connection with your use of FedEx Ship Manager Lite® (FSM Lite) Solution pursuant to applicable laws and regulations.
termsAndCondition.checkBoxOne: I consent to all below terms and conditions
termsAndCondition.checkBoxTwo: [Required] I have fully understood the Company’s explanation on collection and use of general personal information and hereby consent thereto. See detail
termsAndCondition.checkBoxThree: [Required] I have fully understood the Company’s explanation on transfer of general personal information to a third party and hereby consent thereto.See detail
termsAndCondition.checkBoxFour: [Required] I have fully understood the Company’s explanation on overseas transfer of personal information and hereby consent thereto. See detail
termsAndCondition.checkBoxFive: [Optional] I have fully understood the Company’s explanation on the use of personal information for marketing purposes and the transmission of useful information and hereby consent thereto. See detail
termsAndCondition.bodyPart2: [Required] To use FSM Lite Solution and the services provided by FedEx, the consent to the privacy policy and the terms and conditions listed below is required. You may decline to consent to the privacy policy and the terms and conditions listed below. However, if you decline to consent to the privacy policy and the terms and conditions listed below, you may not be able to use FSM Lite Solution and FedEx services.
termsAndCondition.checkBoxSix: I consent to all below agreements
termsAndCondition.checkBoxSeven: [Required] Terms of Use See detail
termsAndCondition.checkBoxEight: [Required] Terms of Service See detail
termsAndCondition.checkBoxNine: [Required] Privacy Policy See detail
termsAndCondition.agreeText: I have carefully read and fully understood the collection and use of personal information above and FedEx terms of use. I hereby apply for the use of FSM Lite Solution.
